item.ectoplasmshild.tool.string.3: Every fifth hit of damage will immunize you from the next attack
item.mbattery.tool.string.1: Attacking zombies deals an additional 50% more damage
item.meye.tool.string: Make undead creatures in a 10 square radius glow.
item.mkidney.tool.string: Probability of not taking this damage when injured
item.mkidney.tool.string.3: If immunity to damage fails, you take an additional 33% of your maximum life damage
item.mkidney.tool.string.4: At the same time this item will go on a 10 second cooldown
item.nanocube.tool.string: Repair 30 durability points of your armor every 45 seconds.
item.nanocube.tool.string.1: *cooldown reduced by 15 seconds when wearing batteries
item.nanorobot.tool.string: Restore 30 durability points to main handheld items every 30 seconds
item.nanorobot.tool.string.1: *cooldown reduced by 15 seconds when wearing batteries
item.thedoomstone.tool.string: Your attacks will have a Blindness debuff.
item.thedoomstone.tool.string.1: Will center on the attacking creature and inflict a sonic boom attack on creatures with the blindness debuff present
item.thedoomstone.tool.string.2: Creatures attacked by Sonic Boom will continue to be affected by negative effects
item.thefruit.tool.string.2: The Warden feels close to you!
item.blueamout.tool.string: Attacks have a chance to weaken enemies
item.blueamout.tool.string.1: Probability of getting Resistance II when injured
item.greedamout.tool.string: Attacks have a chance to draw life
item.greedamout.tool.string.1: Probability of getting Absorption when injured
item.redamout.tool.string: Attacks have a chance to send enemies flying
item.redamout.tool.string.1: Probability of getting Strength II when injured
item.fungus.tool.string: Gain a life Restoration bonus based on the number of pets around you
item.fungus.tool.string.1: Each pet boosts this bonus by 25%
item.fungus.tool.string.3: Convert the Grass cubes under your feet
item.fungus.tool.string.4: Gain life restoration on Mycelium cubes
item.fungus.tool.string.5: Unaffected by effects including Wither, Weakness, Slowness, Poison generation
item.fungus.tool.string.6: You burn in the sun, even if you wear a hat.
item.germ.tool.string: Increases the adaptation value of Germ when digging cubes:
item.germ.tool.string.1: Additional attributes can be gained from Germ for every 250 points of adaptation value
item.parasite.tool.string: Elevated Parasite activity based on the nutritional value of the food
item.parasite.tool.string.1: The more active the Parasite, the stronger your attributes.
item.parasite.tool.string.2: The higher the Parasite activity, the less activity can be increased
item.parasite.tool.string.3: As the Parasites become more active, it will become increasingly difficult for you to get enough to eat
item.parasite.tool.string.4: In moments of necessity, parasites will sacrifice activity to preserve their host!
item.parasite.tool.string.5: You become weak when your Hunger Value is less than 50%.
item.virus.tool.string: Killing creatures to take their DNA!
item.virus.tool.string.1: Every 10 points of DNA taken deals an additional 2.5% damage to this type of creature.
item.botton.tool.string.1: *That way I can build you a whole new body.
item.botton.tool.string.2: Wearing this item and opening loot boxes in Mordor may reveal some genomes
item.catalyzer.tool.string: Right-click to use to infect some special items
item.batskill.tool.string: Attacks have a 15% chance of summoning 3 bats
item.batskill.tool.string.1: And within a radius of 12 squares
item.batskill.tool.string.2: For each bat present, your damage is reduced by 5%.
item.batskill.tool.string.4: Surrounding bats lose 10% of their life every 1 second.
item.batgene.tool.string: Bats in your vicinity take 60% less damage
item.batgene.tool.string.1: For each bat present, you deal 10% more damage.
item.flygene.tool.string.1: When gliding, use the arrow keys to accelerate or decelerate in the air.
item.ragegene.tool.string: When your Attack Stamina Bar is at 100 percent
item.ragegene.tool.string.1: Increases damage by 5% with each attack
item.sleepgene.tool.string: Doesn't get negative effects during the day
item.sleepgene.tool.string.1: Can't get gain effects at night
item.medicinebox.tool.string: If you find some good pills…
item.medicinebox.tool.string.1: *That way I can build you a whole new body.
item.medicinebox.tool.string.2: Wearing this item allows you to obtain pills in certain ways
item.medicinebox.tool.string.3: You can choose to fuse the found pills or just wear the
item.medicinebox.tool.string.4: This item must be worn in order to discover the pill!
item.calcification.tool.string: *Calcifies the experimenter's skin and enhances the experimenter's ability to fight
item.masticatory.tool.string: *Strengthening of the experimenter's occlusal muscles to the point of enhancing the experimenter's chewing ability
item.polyphagia.tool.string.1: when eat food you will heal 10% max health
item.quadriceps.tool.string: *Strengthening of the experimenter's quadriceps muscles to the point of enhancing the experimenter's locomotor ability
item.reanimation.tool.string: *Activate the experimenter's cells to the point of enhancing the experimenter's ability to regenerate cells
item.reanimation.tool.string.1: Simultaneous restoration of basic functions of vital organs
item.autolytic.tool.string: Suppresses the swimming speed reduction effect from the Necora virus
item.fermentation.tool.string.1: During cooldown, damage is reduced by 70%
item.fermentation.tool.string.3: *Pathogens still retain their hunting instincts, which allows them to wait patiently and deliver the killing blow!
item.putrefactive.tool.string: Increases the effect caused by carrion
item.regenerative.tool.string.1: *The cells of pathogens are more vibrant than in the past
item.bloodvirus.tool.string: Increases damage against non-undead creatures by 25
item.bloodvirus.tool.string.2: When gliding, you can use the forward button to sprint
item.bloodvirus.tool.string.3: In the dark, you'll get Night vision
item.bloodvirus.tool.string.6: Reduces life restoration effects from any source by 30%
item.bloodvirus.tool.string.7: You will burn in the sun and become extremely weak!
item.bloodvirus.tool.string.11: *Mutagenic parasites with sensory abilities which stimulate bloodlust in their hosts!
item.necora.tool.string.1: *You are terrified of the water; swimming speed is drastically reduced
item.necora.tool.string.2: *You'll burn in the sun; maybe wearing something on your head will solve the problem for a while
item.necora.tool.string.3: *Your body gradually reeks of rot; Human Villagers fear you, and Iron golems see you as an enemy.
item.necora.tool.string.4: *Ability to recognize one's own kind; damage dealt to undead reduced by 20 percent
item.necora.tool.string.5: *Once the virus is implanted, there will be no turning back!
item.necora.tool.string.7: *Your body is harder; damage increased by 3 points, armor value increased by 4 points
item.necora.tool.string.8: *Difficult to be affected by the elements; 70% less magical damage taken
item.necora.tool.string.9: *Any creature will be torn to carrion by you, eat them and you will gain additional effects!
item.necora.tool.string.10: *You are considered a lord by your own kind; reduces damage dealt to you by undead creatures by 50%
item.necora.tool.string.11: *Significant increase in cellular activity; 50% increase in life recovery
item.necora.tool.string.12: The pathogen has not been classified
item.necora.tool.string.13: and early medical reports indicate that it has
item.necora.tool.string.14: Strong regeneration and an unending need to eat
item.necora.tool.string.15: But much of its genetic structure remains an unsolved mystery...
item.diemug.tool.string: Right click on this Holy Grail with the potion
item.diemug.tool.string.1: ou can store the effect of the potion (there can be 8 types)
item.diemug.tool.string.2: Obtain all medicinal effects after drinking
item.evilcandle.tool.string.2: Quickly extinguish the flames on your body
item.evilmug.tool.string.1: Replenish the fresh blood in the barrel (secondary hand) from the damage caused during the attack
item.evilmug.tool.string.2: And you can extract your own blood

item.maxamout.tool.string.4: There is a probability that during an attack, the enemy will be knocked away and slowed down.
item.maxamout.tool.string.6: After taking damage, 20% will be returned to the attacker.
item.bloodgene.tool.string: Basic damage, reduced attack speed by 50%
item.bloodgene.tool.string.1: Every time you take damage, you will receive an improvement
item.bloodgene.tool.string.2: The maximum is 200% of the original
item.flyeye.tool.string.2: Cause damage to surrounding creatures during invincibility
item.plague.tool.string.un: use nightmare eye Can Un equip plague

item.plague.tool.string.5: The number of points affects the attributes, and it is best to complete it within the specified time
item.doomeye.tool.string: Summon 7 flying swords to attack enemies when injured

item.doomswoud.tool.string.2: Kill the creature and immediately summon 4 flying swords

item.wind_and_rain.tool.string.1: Afterwards, use the soul possessed weapon and long press the right button to summon the flying sword

advancements.tooltip.twistedstone.text: Obtain the stone at the beginning of the game"

item.beacon.tool.string.1: and synchronously add the potion effects to all creatures within the surrounding 5 grid range.
advancements.tooltip.beacon.text: Now, we truly share weal and woe.

item.mhead.tool.string.1: Target speed increases and recovers after taking your damage

item.cell_blood.tool.string: Zombies gain the ability to suck blood and each attack prolongs their lifespan

item.slime.tool.string: Kill creatures to summon slime zombie (33%)

advancements.tooltip.virus.text: When wearing a culture dish and experiencing weak effects, being hit by a withered skull

item.the_heart.tool.string.1: If the dropped object is one of the items in the heart

item.nightmare_orb.tool.string.2: But deal 1% maximum health damage per second
item.nightmare_orb.tool.string.3: And unable to receive treatment during this period
item.giant_nightmare.tool.string: Killing creatures has a chance to summon the Nightmare Giant
item.speed_seed.tool.string: Fixed speed to 120% of normal value

item.sword_amout.tool.string.1: But your damage will gradually decrease, at most to 33% of its original level
item.sword_amout.tool.string.2: When attacking with full force, it will not cause invincible frame protection
item.sword_amout.tool.string.3: When your slash count reaches 10, each attack will cause a range effect
item.light_amout.tool.string: If the distance of a single fall is greater than 2
item.light_amout.tool.string.1: So the next all-out strike will be accompanied by a large-scale lightning attack
item.light_amout.tool.string.2: The damage of lightning will increase with the increase of its own attack damage and fall distance
item.light_amout.tool.string.3: For every additional grid, there will be a 10% increase in damage

item.subspace_cell.tool.string: Summon Nightmare Giant to no longer consume health points
item.bone_cell.tool.string: Giant cell zombies will receive 70% of the summoner's armor value when summoned
item.parasitic_cell.tool.string: Giant cell zombies give birth to 5 cell zombies after death
item.mother_cell.tool.string: Giant cell zombies will generate an additional 2 cell zombies when summoned, with a 50% chance of summoning another giant zombie
item.disgusting_cells.tool.string: The survival time of giant cell zombies is increased by 100%
item.bat_cell.tool.string: Summon a Shadow Bat with 15% health loss
item.bat_cell.tool.string.1: Reduce current health by 15% after summoning
item.bat_cell.tool.string.2: The more health points lost, the higher the damage dealt by the Shadow Bat

item.cell_desecrate.tool.string: You and Shadow Bat deal 40% more damage to non undead creatures
item.cell_harvest.tool.string: The probability of summoning Shadow Bat increases by 35%, but the cooldown time doubles
item.cell_scientist.tool.string: When summoning the Shadow Bat, the amount of blood sacrificed doubles, and the Shadow Bat's health and attack power increase according to the amount of blood sacrificed
item.cell_immortal.tool.string: Your and Shadow Bat's armor value increases by 10 points
item.cell_rage.tool.string: Your attack damage increases by 25%, and Shadow Bat's damage is halved
item.cell_blood_attack.tool.string: The Shadow Bat will restore 10% of the Sacrifice's health based on the damage it causes
item.cell_fear.tool.string: Increase the survival time of Shadow Bat by 50%
item.cell_not_do.tool.string: Shadow bats no longer need to sacrifice health points
item.the_pain_stone.tool.string.1: After killing a creature, convert 50% of its maximum health to the next additional attack damage
item.the_pain_stone.tool.string.2: If the next damage caused exceeds the maximum health of the creature
item.the_pain_stone.tool.string.3: So the additional damage will proportionally restore one's own health
item.pain_candle.tool.string: When restoring health,+1% of damage is taken
item.pain_candle.tool.string.1: Until it returns to full health status
item.pain_ring.tool.string: When restoring health, increase damage by 1% (not exceeding 100%)
item.pain_ring.tool.string.1: Until it returns to full health status
item.max_sword.tool.string: Each attack has a probability of generating a blood cell to rotate around you
item.max_sword.tool.string.1: When the number of blood cells exceeds 8,
item.max_sword.tool.string.2: The next slash will deal triple damage
item.max_sword.tool.string.3: Blood cells will be absorbed by you over time
item.max_sword.tool.string.4: Each absorption will restore a certain percentage of health
item.max_sword.tool.string.5: Each blood cell provides a 5% damage bonus
item.max_sword.tool.string.6: Blood cell explosion causes bleeding effect on organisms within 3 cells
item.max_sword.tool.string.7: Kill the creature and obtain 1-3 blood cells
item.max_blood_eye.tool.string: Every time you strike with all your might, you will experience bleeding
item.max_blood_eye.tool.string.1: When the number of bleeding organisms in the vicinity exceeds 3
item.max_blood_eye.tool.string.2: Generate a blood explosion and cause damage based on the number of organisms
item.max_blood_eye.tool.string.3: The affected person will bleed, and if the condition already exists, it will be converted to serious injury
item.max_eye.tool.string.1: Up to 4 points can be stored
item.max_eye.tool.string.2: When you have blood, you will reduce damage by 90%
item.max_eye.tool.string.3: But every time you get hurt, you lose a drop of blood
item.max_eye.tool.string.4: Over time, your health will also be absorbed and restored to 10% of your maximum health
item.nightmare_cube.tool.string: You can press Shift while approaching the creature and release the dark dye thread
advancements.tooltip.max_eye.hand: with no chink in one's armour！
item.nightmare_head.tool.string: Immune to all non biological injuries
item.nightmare_head.tool.string.1: Damage reduction from any source is ineffective and the damage taken is fixed at 1 point, with a maximum health value fixed at 10 points
item.nightmare_head.tool.string.2: Restores 0.2 health point per second, unaffected by any bonuses
item.nightmare_head.tool.string.3: Bounce 200% penetration damage to the attacker
item.nightmare_head.tool.string.4: And every time you wear this item and die, it will reduce your health by 10% and cause the item to fall off
item.nightmare_head.tool.string.6: Reduce the curse of the abyss by 100%
item.nightmare_head.tool.string.8: And there will always be a ratio between your health and maximum health

item.god_lead.tool.string.2: If this organism dies, then cool it down and clear it

item.blood.tool.string.winds.2: If you wear a nightmare item, the damage doubles

item.probability.tool.string.6: Every bit of luck adds 5% to the maximum and minimum values,

moonfabric.tooltip.rageapple.2: ·These attributes will increase movement speed, damage, health, attack speed, and armor
moonfabric.tooltip.doomfruit.1: ·If you consume it, you will permanently +1 ring slot
moonfabric.tooltip.doomstone.2: ·Any damage received will be immune, but there is a 1.2 second cooldown
moonfabric.tooltip.doomsoul.1: ·If you are killed and the target creature's health is not greater than 30%
moonfabric.tooltip.doomsoul.2: ·Then the creature will suffer 29% maximum health damage
moonfabric.tooltip.doomsoul.4: ·If the target's health is greater than 30%
moonfabric.tooltip.doomsoul.5: ·that will gain 3 minutes of weakness and slowness
moonfabric.tooltip.curseeye.1: ·Creatures within a radius of 10 squares will emit light
moonfabric.tooltip.doomcharm.1: ·Increase attributes based on the total level of negative potions on your body
moonfabric.tooltip.curseshield.2: ·An explosion occurred and caused serious negative effects on surrounding organisms
moonfabric.tooltip.redstone.1: ·When dealing critical damage, you will strength
moonfabric.tooltip.bluestone.1: ·When dealing critical damage, inflict weakness on the target
moonfabric.tooltip.greenstone.1: ·When dealing critical damage, you will heal 1 health
moonfabric.tooltip.blackhead.3: ·And strike the attacker flying and deal 20% maximum health damage to it

moonfabric.tooltip.goldbox.3: ·you will be given an enchanted golden apple and three ordinary golden apples

moonfabric.tooltip.candle.2: ·The higher the health, the higher the defense
moonfabric.tooltip.book.1: ·The fewer trinkets worn, the higher the damage
moonfabric.tooltip.twistedorb.1: ·Killing a creature will generate a special stone
moonfabric.tooltip.twistedsoul.1: ·You can use soul speed on all blocks
moonfabric.tooltip.endchestplus.2: ·and then you can open it anywhere

moonfabric.tooltip.goldcottoncandy.6: ·Only this type of cotton candy can be worn

moonfabric.tooltip.woodcottoncandy.6: ·Only this type of cotton candy can be worn

moonfabric.tooltip.stonecottoncandy.3: ·Hurt Damage from wooden sword or wooden axe increased by 500%
moonfabric.tooltip.stonecottoncandy.4: ·Attack the disabled target's Ocean Cotton Candy and deal an additional 50% damage
moonfabric.tooltip.stonecottoncandy.5: ·Only this type of cotton candy can be worn
moonfabric.tooltip.watercottoncandy.1: ·Increase damage and armor in water or rain by 35% and gain buffs
moonfabric.tooltip.watercottoncandy.2: ·Immune to flame damage and magic damage
moonfabric.tooltip.watercottoncandy.3: ·Attack the disabled target's Flame Cotton Candy and deal an additional 50% damage
moonfabric.tooltip.watercottoncandy.5: ·on land ：-50% attack damage,movement speed ，and +100% Hurt damage
moonfabric.tooltip.watercottoncandy.6: ·Only this type of cotton candy can be worn
moonfabric.tooltip.firecottoncandy.1: ·The higher the target's armor, the more damage you deal
moonfabric.tooltip.firecottoncandy.2: ·The creatures near you will slow down and weaken, and you will be immune to flames
moonfabric.tooltip.firecottoncandy.3: ·In lava ：+50% mining speed, speed, damage, armor, health

item.nightmareanchor.tool.string.2: Right click to teleport to the previous record point
item.nightmareanchor.tool.string.3: But you have to be in the same dimension
item.nightmareanchor.tool.string.5: Reduces curse from the Nightmare by 5%
item.nightmareanchor.tool.string.6: Only those who bear the fear of the Nightmare
item.nightmareanchor.tool.string.7: To be eligible to use this prop
item.nightmarecharm.tool.string.3: Only those who bear the fear of the Nightmare
item.nightmarecharm.tool.string.4: To be eligible to use this prop
item.nightmareeye.tool.string.1: Most of your attributes will be reduced by 25%
item.nightmaremoai.tool.string: +2 Enchantment level of the enchanted product
item.nightmaremoai.tool.string.1: Only those who bear the fear of the Nightmare
item.nightmaremoai.tool.string.2: To be eligible to use this prop
item.nightmarerotten.tool.string.2: Curses from the Nightmare will increase by 1.1%
item.nightmarerotten.tool.string.3: Only those who bear the fear of the Nightmare
item.nightmarerotten.tool.string.4: To be eligible to use this prop
item.nightmarestone.tool.string: For each debuff that exists on you:
item.nightmarestone.tool.string.7: Double the duration of any debuffs on you
item.nightmarestone.tool.string.8: Taking damage from any source gains a random debuff
item.nightmarestone.tool.string.9: Only those who bear the fear of the Nightmare
item.nightmarestone.tool.string.10: To be eligible to use this prop
item.nightmaretreasure.tool.string.1: Loot gained from kills has a 33% chance of getting triple
item.nightmaretreasure.tool.string.2: Each increase of 1 in luck increases the probability by 3%
item.nightmaretreasure.tool.string.4: Only those who bear the fear of the Nightmare
item.nightmaretreasure.tool.string.5: To be eligible to use this prop
moonfabric.tooltip.gazer.1: ·If the single damage received is greater than 33% of the maximum health value
moonfabric.tooltip.bloodcharm.1: ·When a single damage received exceeds 50% of the maximum health:
moonfabric.tooltip.bloodcharm.2: ·This item will enter cooldown time and increase damage and resistance by 30% for ten seconds
moonfabric.tooltip.bloodcharm.3: ·But during non cooldown time, the damage taken increases by 40%
moonfabric.tooltip.furybloodpearl.3: ·Every injury has a chance to trigger a burst of blood
moonfabric.tooltip.furybloodpearl.4: ·Deal 20% maximum health damage to nearby creatures
moonfabric.tooltip.furybloodpearl.5: ·And in the next 20 seconds, these creatures will lose 50% of their armor and maximum health
moonfabric.tooltip.glodstone.1: ·When dealing critical strikes, weaken this creature,
moonfabric.tooltip.glodstone.2: ·And steal its health and gain a power buff
moonfabric.tooltip.glodstone.3: ·After being damaged, there is a chance to counterattack this creature,
moonfabric.tooltip.glodstone.4: ·And gain resistance enhancement and damage absorption buff
moonfabric.tooltip.glodstone.5: ·When the damage received exceeds 50% of one's maximum health:
moonfabric.tooltip.fissionreactor.2: ·Energy will automatically repair the durability of backpack items
moonfabric.tooltip.fissionreactor.3: ·Simultaneously generating a certain amount of radiation, which will affect your speed and health
moonfabric.tooltip.fissionreactor.4: ·Therefore, you must occasionally remove this item and long press the right button to handle radiation
moonfabric.tooltip.bloodorb.4: ·Restore 1 health every 3 seconds, unaffected by bonuses
moonfabric.tooltip.bloodorb.5: ·You and the creatures around you will continue to receive the effect of Blood Fury
moonfabric.tooltip.nanoheart.1: ·Make your attributes similar to those of Warden
moonfabric.tooltip.nanoheart.4: ·And when you gaze at them, you will increase your speed by 100%
moonfabric.tooltip.nanofruit.1: ·Warden will maintain absolute friendship with you
moonfabric.tooltip.nanocottoncandy.1: ·The first time you receive damage, you will be immune
moonfabric.tooltip.nanocottoncandy.5: ·After your immunity fails, you will suffer 150% damage
moonfabric.tooltip.nanocottoncandy.6: ·Afterwards, this item will enter a 10 second cooldown time
moonfabric.tooltip.bloodeye.1: ·After wearing it, it will generate a Blood Spirit every 30 seconds
moonfabric.tooltip.bloodeye.2: ·Blood spirit will periodically cause damage to surrounding creatures
moonfabric.tooltip.bloodeye.3: ·Blood spirit can survive for up to 30 seconds
moonfabric.tooltip.bloodtime.2: ·if you equipped The blood ring,the time to summon blood spirits is reduced by 66%
moonfabric.tooltip.pain_book.1: ·You can eat copper blocks and copper ingots
moonfabric.tooltip.pain_book.2: ·Copper Block: Strength II, Urgency II, Life Recovery II (30 seconds)
moonfabric.tooltip.pain_book.3: ·Copper ingot: Speed II, Resistance I (10 seconds)
moonfabric.tooltip.pain_book.5: ·The more you eat, the more hungry you get
moonfabric.tooltip.pain_carrot.1: ·Eating food gives a 10% increase in strength
moonfabric.tooltip.pain_carrot.2: ·Clear when full hunger value is reached
moonfabric.tooltip.pain_heart.2: ·Every injury will increase your resistance by 3.3%,cleared with full health
moonfabric.tooltip.blood_candle: Summon a giant Blood Spirit Hyperplasia to assist you in battle,
moonfabric.tooltip.blood_candle.1: If lost/missing, please wear this item again,
moonfabric.tooltip.blood_candle.2: The attack of Blood Spirit Hyperplasia will cause damage based on your maximum health,
moonfabric.tooltip.dna.1: Right click to store DNA, up to 320 can be stored
moonfabric.tooltip.dna.2: You must pair this item to discover DNA
item.ectoplasmapple.tool.string: ·Injury causes 2% maximum health damage to nearby organisms
item.ectoplasmshild.tool.string.1: Every time you receive 5 injuries, you will be immune once
item.ectoplasmstar.tool.string.1: Lucky for every 1 point:+1% attack speed,+0.5% damage
moonfabric.tooltip.necora: You must refer to the 'Module Guide Book' to understand the settings
moonfabric.tooltip.pain_candle.2: ·-10% resistance when not at full health
